title: how to configure FastAPI
body:
A wonderful work, but I don't know which API_KEY should be configured.
Could you give some instructions?
Thank you!
author: WindZh03

comments.body: Using the default command, you do not need to configure anything. We use a free search engine and open-source LLM

Sorry to bother you again.
Don't I need to set the OPENAI_API_KEY and BING_API_KEY?

---

I got it, thanks.

satisfaction_conditions: Clarification on whether API keys (OPENAI_API_KEY/BING_API_KEY) are required for the setup
Explanation of the default configuration's dependency on free/open-source services
